scripts.preinstall: (cd ../.. && npm install && npm run-script build:pack) || echo "WARNING: failed to build parent module for local dependency; if 'npm install' fails see README.md"
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf dist node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.test: (test $(node dist/index.js 3 + 5) -eq 8 && echo 'âœ… SUCCESS ðŸ˜ƒ') || (echo 'â€¼ï¸ FAILURE ðŸ˜§' >&2 && exit 1)
scripts.smoke-test: npm run-script clean:all && npm run-script build:all && npm run-script test
